website_summaries.verdict: Like a trendy T-shirt for your chair.
pros: We loved the bold stripes for an instant room transformation
Works very well on IKEA Henriksdal chairs
cons: Fabric is saggy on smaller chairs

customer_reviews.title: Was Scared BUT...
customer_reviews.text: This item was awesome! Transformed my room in secs with these covers. Great quality and strong stretch. I was able to use them on ikea henriksdals chairs. The chairs are pretty large but the fabric stretched well and is holding up pretty good! Great buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: B. LOPEZ

customer_reviews.title: The fit is fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Skirt is way shorter and it's all stretchy material but for the look in the price it works great
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: I returned these and am giving them a two because the refund/return process was a good experience.
customer_reviews.text: really cheap looking. I returned these and am giving them a two because the refund/return process was a good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Adore!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new chair covers! The color is vibrant and the material is stretchy and awesome! Recommended these to several of my friends. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: pastrychef27

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect I love them great quality ..so happy I bought them
customer_reviews.author: Shallando Hyde

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Got these today! Earlier than expected! And they look awesome! Love them!❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are an elegant statement for any chair
customer_reviews.text: My mom loved these chair covers i first ordered 4 and my mom fell in love with them cus they make any chair look elegant. So i bought 6 more to gift to mom for her dining chairs.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON_FAN#1

customer_reviews.title: Great slipcover
customer_reviews.text: This is a great inexpensive slipcover. It transformed a room by transforming 2 chairs. And because the fabric is so stretchy it fits different size.chairs. Also the crisp stripe gives a lot of bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Jilann J. Sneider

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING EVER
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best thing! They fit perfect and add so much to the room. Thank you. Good ship, great quality, true description
customer_reviews.author: Food Service

customer_reviews.title: nice look.
customer_reviews.text: VERY STRETCHY....will fit almost any armless chair. You may want to add some lightweight batting underneath to smooth out appearance. Just depends on how fussy you are. Overall, nice look.
customer_reviews.author: N.Luken

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my dining room chairs. Its shanby chic and complements my living room and kitchen area theme.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Took a little while to receive it but supper happy with the slipcover, it looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Robbins

customer_reviews.title: change the look.
customer_reviews.text: These are great chair covers,exactly as described.Great stretch material .luv the look.
customer_reviews.author: MARGARET HOLLEY
